name: Barely an Inconvenience
description:
WELCOME TO THE LAB?

You are Jeffrey Square, an intern at Big Labs Incorporated. Recently one of the BLI sites has been been set for demolition, and it's up to you to hit the building's self destruct button! Only problem is, the architects of this specific site sucked at their job, so there's no easy way to the center!

MADE FOR THE AUTUMN LEAF JANUARY 2022 GAME JAM With the theme "Inconvenient Superpowers"
